title: Chao Shou Wuzhuang Zhi Renzhe Wudi
synopsis: In a holy war 100,000 years ago, Hades and Snow Emperor were sealed one after another, and the Seven Universes ushered in 100,000 years of peace. Today, one hundred thousand years later, Pluto will wake up in seven days. At that time, the seven parallel universes will usher in a doomsday catastrophe. In order to prevent this catastrophe, the five beast warriors full of conviction set foot on the road to destroy the Hades without hesitation. It’s a pity that when they are about to destroy Pluto, it is also the moment when Pluto fully awakens.(translated from baidu baike)

Sequel.name: Chao Shou Wuzhuang Zhi Yongzhe Wu Ju
